problem_names:
lemma flatten_code_equations[simp]:
  "\<phi>[set M]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1 = flatten_pi_1_list \<phi> M"
  "\<phi>[set M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1 = flatten_sigma_1_list \<phi> M"
  "\<phi>[set M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2 = flatten_sigma_2_list \<phi> M"
lemma and_list_semantic: "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n and_list xs \<longleftrightarrow> (\<forall>x \<in> set xs. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n x)"
lemma or_list_semantic: "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n or_list xs \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>x \<in> set xs. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n x)"
translations:
lemma flatten_code_equations[simp]:
  "\<phi>[set M]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1 = flatten_pi_1_list \<phi> M"
  "\<phi>[set M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1 = flatten_sigma_1_list \<phi> M"
  "\<phi>[set M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2 = flatten_sigma_2_list \<phi> M"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<phi>[set M]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1 = flatten_pi_1_list \<phi> M &&&
    \<phi>[set M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1 = flatten_sigma_1_list \<phi> M &&&
    \<phi>[set M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2 = flatten_sigma_2_list \<phi> M
by (induction \<phi>) auto
abbreviation "and_list \<equiv> foldl And_ltln true\<^sub>n"
abbreviation "or_list \<equiv> foldl Or_ltln false\<^sub>n"

definition "normal_form_disjunct (\<phi> :: String.literal ltln) M N 
  \<equiv> (flatten_sigma_2_list \<phi> M)
      and\<^sub>n (and_list (map (\<lambda>\<psi>. G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n (flatten_sigma_1_list \<psi> N))) M) 
      and\<^sub>n (and_list (map (\<lambda>\<psi>. F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n (flatten_pi_1_list    \<psi> M))) N)))"

definition "normal_form (\<phi> :: String.literal ltln) 
  \<equiv> or_list (map (\<lambda>(M, N). normal_form_disjunct \<phi> M N) (advice_sets \<phi>))"
lemma and_list_semantic: "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n and_list xs \<longleftrightarrow> (\<forall>x \<in> set xs. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n and_list xs =
    (\<forall>x\<in>set xs. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n x)
by (induction xs rule: rev_induct) auto
lemma or_list_semantic: "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n or_list xs \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>x \<in> set xs. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n or_list xs =
    (\<exists>x\<in>set xs. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n x)
by (induction xs rule: rev_induct) auto

theorem normal_form_correct:
  "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> \<longleftrightarrow> w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> =
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>
proof

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>
 2. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
assume "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>"

proof (state)
this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>
 2. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>

obtain M N where "M \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> \<phi>" and "N \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> \<phi>"
    and c1: "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2" and c2: "\<forall>\<psi> \<in> M. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[N]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1)" and c3: "\<forall>\<psi> \<in> N. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[M]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)"
using normal_form_with_flatten_sigma_2

proof (prove)
using this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
  ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n ?\<phi> =
  (\<exists>M\<subseteq>subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> ?\<phi>.
      \<exists>N\<subseteq>subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> ?\<phi>.
         ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n ?\<phi>[M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2 \<and>
         (\<forall>\<psi>\<in>M.
             ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[N]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1)) \<and>
         (\<forall>\<psi>\<in>N.
             ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[M]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>M N.
        \<lbrakk>M \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> \<phi>;
         N \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> \<phi>;
         w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2;
         \<forall>\<psi>\<in>M.
            w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[N]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1);
         \<forall>\<psi>\<in>N.
            w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[M]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by metis

proof (state)
this:
  M \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> \<phi>
  N \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> \<phi>
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>M.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[N]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1)
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>N.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[M]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>
 2. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  M \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> \<phi>
  N \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> \<phi>
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>M.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[N]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1)
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>N.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[M]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)
obtain ms ns where "M = set ms" and "N = set ns" and ms_ns_in: "(ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  M \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> \<phi>
  N \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> \<phi>
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>M.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[N]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1)
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>N.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[M]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>ms ns.
        \<lbrakk>M = set ms; N = set ns;
         (ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>)\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by (meson advice_sets_subformulas)

proof (state)
this:
  M = set ms
  N = set ns
  (ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>
 2. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  M = set ms
  N = set ns
  (ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>)
have "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns"

proof (prove)
using this:
  M = set ms
  N = set ns
  (ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns
using c1 c2 c3

proof (prove)
using this:
  M = set ms
  N = set ns
  (ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>)
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>M.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[N]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1)
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>N.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[M]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns
by (simp add: and_list_semantic normal_form_disjunct_def)

proof (state)
this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>
 2. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns
show "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>
using normal_form_def or_list_semantic ms_ns_in

proof (prove)
using this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns
  normal_form ?\<phi> \<equiv>
  or_list
   (map (\<lambda>(M, N). normal_form_disjunct ?\<phi> M N)
     (advice_sets ?\<phi>))
  ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n or_list ?xs =
  (\<exists>x\<in>set ?xs. ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n x)
  (ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>
by fastforce

proof (state)
this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
assume "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>"

proof (state)
this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>

obtain ms ns where "(ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>)" 
    and "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns"

proof (prove)
using this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>ms ns.
        \<lbrakk>(ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>);
         w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
unfolding normal_form_def or_list_semantic

proof (prove)
using this:
  Bex (set (map (\<lambda>(x, y). normal_form_disjunct \<phi> x y)
             (advice_sets \<phi>)))
   (semantics_ltln w)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>ms ns.
        \<lbrakk>(ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>);
         w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by force

proof (state)
this:
  (ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>)
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>)
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns

have "set ms \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> \<phi>" and "set ns \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> \<phi>"
    and c1: "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[set ms]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2" and c2: "\<forall>\<psi> \<in> set ms. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[set ns]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1)" and c3: "\<forall>\<psi> \<in> set ns. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[set ms]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>)
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (set ms \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> \<phi> &&&
     set ns \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> \<phi>) &&&
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[set ms]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2 &&&
    \<forall>\<psi>\<in>set ms.
       w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[set
                     ns]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1) &&&
    \<forall>\<psi>\<in>set ns.
       w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[set
                     ms]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)
using advice_sets_element_subfrmlsn

proof (prove)
using this:
  (ms, ns) \<in> set (advice_sets \<phi>)
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form_disjunct \<phi> ms ns
  (?xs, ?ys) \<in> set (advice_sets ?\<phi>) \<Longrightarrow>
  set ?xs \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> ?\<phi>
  (?xs, ?ys) \<in> set (advice_sets ?\<phi>) \<Longrightarrow>
  set ?ys \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> ?\<phi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (set ms \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> \<phi> &&&
     set ns \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> \<phi>) &&&
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[set ms]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2 &&&
    \<forall>\<psi>\<in>set ms.
       w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[set
                     ns]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1) &&&
    \<forall>\<psi>\<in>set ns.
       w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[set
                     ms]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)
by (auto simp: and_list_semantic normal_form_disjunct_def) blast

proof (state)
this:
  set ms \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> \<phi>
  set ns \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> \<phi>
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[set ms]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>set ms.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[set
                   ns]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1)
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>set ns.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[set
                   ms]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  set ms \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> \<phi>
  set ns \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> \<phi>
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[set ms]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>set ms.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[set
                   ns]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1)
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>set ns.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[set
                   ms]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)
show "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  set ms \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> \<phi>
  set ns \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> \<phi>
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[set ms]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>set ms.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[set
                   ns]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1)
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>set ns.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[set
                   ms]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
using normal_form_with_flatten_sigma_2

proof (prove)
using this:
  set ms \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> \<phi>
  set ns \<subseteq> subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> \<phi>
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>[set ms]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>set ms.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[set
                   ns]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1)
  \<forall>\<psi>\<in>set ns.
     w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[set
                   ms]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)
  ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n ?\<phi> =
  (\<exists>M\<subseteq>subformulas\<^sub>\<mu> ?\<phi>.
      \<exists>N\<subseteq>subformulas\<^sub>\<nu> ?\<phi>.
         ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n ?\<phi>[M]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>2 \<and>
         (\<forall>\<psi>\<in>M.
             ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n G\<^sub>n (F\<^sub>n \<psi>[N]\<^sub>\<Sigma>\<^sub>1)) \<and>
         (\<forall>\<psi>\<in>N.
             ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n F\<^sub>n (G\<^sub>n \<psi>[M]\<^sub>\<Pi>\<^sub>1)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
by metis

proof (state)
this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

definition "normal_form_with_simplifier (\<phi> :: String.literal ltln) 
  \<equiv> min_dnf (simplify Slow (normal_form (simplify Slow \<phi>)))"

lemma ltl_semantics_min_dnf:
  "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>C \<in> min_dnf \<phi>. \<forall>\<psi>. \<psi> |\<in>| C \<longrightarrow> w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>)" (is "?lhs \<longleftrightarrow> ?rhs")

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> =
    (\<exists>C\<in>min_dnf \<phi>.
        \<forall>\<psi>.
           \<psi> |\<in>| C \<longrightarrow> w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>)
proof

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>C\<in>min_dnf \<phi>.
       \<forall>\<psi>.
          \<psi> |\<in>| C \<longrightarrow> w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>
 2. \<exists>C\<in>min_dnf \<phi>.
       \<forall>\<psi>.
          \<psi> |\<in>| C \<longrightarrow>
          w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
let ?M = "{\<psi>. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>}"

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>C\<in>min_dnf \<phi>.
       \<forall>\<psi>.
          \<psi> |\<in>| C \<longrightarrow> w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>
 2. \<exists>C\<in>min_dnf \<phi>.
       \<forall>\<psi>.
          \<psi> |\<in>| C \<longrightarrow>
          w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
assume ?lhs

proof (state)
this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>C\<in>min_dnf \<phi>.
       \<forall>\<psi>.
          \<psi> |\<in>| C \<longrightarrow> w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>
 2. \<exists>C\<in>min_dnf \<phi>.
       \<forall>\<psi>.
          \<psi> |\<in>| C \<longrightarrow>
          w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
hence "?M \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P \<phi>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {\<psi>. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>} \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P \<phi>
using ltl_models_equiv_prop_entailment

proof (prove)
using this:
  w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
  ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n ?\<phi> =
  {\<psi>. ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>} \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P ?\<phi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {\<psi>. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>} \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P \<phi>
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  {\<psi>. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>} \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P \<phi>

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>C\<in>min_dnf \<phi>.
       \<forall>\<psi>.
          \<psi> |\<in>| C \<longrightarrow> w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>
 2. \<exists>C\<in>min_dnf \<phi>.
       \<forall>\<psi>.
          \<psi> |\<in>| C \<longrightarrow>
          w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi> \<Longrightarrow>
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi>
then

proof (chain)
picking this:

theorem 
  "w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>C \<in> (normal_form_with_simplifier \<phi>). \<forall>\<psi>. \<psi> |\<in>| C \<longrightarrow> w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>)" (is "?lhs \<longleftrightarrow> ?rhs")

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> =
    (\<exists>C\<in>normal_form_with_simplifier \<phi>.
        \<forall>\<psi>.
           \<psi> |\<in>| C \<longrightarrow> w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<psi>)
unfolding normal_form_with_simplifier_def ltl_semantics_min_dnf[symmetric]

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> =
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n simplify Slow
                            (normal_form (simplify Slow \<phi>))
using normal_form_correct

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n ?\<phi> =
  ?w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n normal_form ?\<phi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n \<phi> =
    w \<Turnstile>\<^sub>n simplify Slow
                            (normal_form (simplify Slow \<phi>))
by simp
text \<open>In order to export the code run \texttt{isabelle build -D [PATH] -e}.\<close>
export_code normal_form in SML
export_code normal_form_with_simplifier in SML
end
